ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Poll
ygData.msgSnippet: 2H blunt... get it pratice it, use it...  hehe You can always use a piercing weapon later in the game cause thats what you are limited to in the beginning.
ygData.messageBody:
2H blunt... get it pratice it, use it... hehe

You can always use a piercing weapon later in the game cause thats what you
are limited to in the beginning. Hence you will probably have piercing skill
maxed out , due to your high int. Most weapons ( if you use any at all )
later on in the game will be 2H blunt weapons, therefore its best to get
yourself a worn great staff as soon as you can and build your skill for your
future 2H staffs.

Lance

Wizaro 3rd lvl Erudite Wizard - Sollusk Ro
